categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: Battle of the New Apsolon system

A battle was a battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, in 3996 BBY. At the New Apsolon system, the two sides fought with the Sith emerging as the victors.
The battle is referenced in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map of the Great Sith War.
